sentences.en: Dengta marine built gypsum deposits occurred in Mantou Jianchang Formations, Lower Cambrian.
sentences.cn: 灯塔海积石膏矿床赋存于下寒武统馒头组—碱厂组中.

sentences.en: Gypsum and halite are simply thinned or removed altogether.
sentences.cn: 石膏与岩盐则逐渐变薄或完全被溶解掉.

sentences.en: Gypsum may crystallize on the surface of the phosphate rock particles.
sentences.cn: 石膏会在磷矿颗粒的表面上结晶.

sentences.en: Hemihydrate can be used instead of gypsum.
sentences.cn: 半水物硫酸钙可以用来代替石膏.

sentences.en: In 1962 there more than 80 undertakings in western Germany engaged in the gypsum industry.
sentences.cn: 1962年在西德有80家以上的企业从事石膏工业.

sentences.en: It is not practical to introduce ammonia and carbon dioxide separatily into the gypsum slurry.
sentences.cn: 将氨和二氧化碳分别通进石膏料浆是不切实际的.

sentences.en: Mineral resources, coal, iron, gypsum - based, lead, also contains mica.
sentences.cn: 矿产资源以煤 、 铁 、 石膏为主, 铅 、 云母也有蕴藏.

sentences.en: Mineral Resources: the territory of coal, copper, limestone, gypsum informative.
sentences.cn: 矿产资源: 境内煤炭 、 铜 、 石灰石 、 石膏资料丰富.

sentences.en: Modern Paris sits atop massive formations of limestone and gypsum.
sentences.cn: 近代巴黎是由大块的石灰岩和石膏构成的。

sentences.en: Primary chalk filters and gypsum repulper are made of AISI 304 stainless steel.
sentences.cn: 一般碳酸钙过滤机和石膏再浆器用AISI3O4号不锈钢制成.

sentences.en: The gypsum slurry is pumped into a diked area.
sentences.cn: 我们用泵将石膏料浆打到一块用堤围起来的空地中.

sentences.en: The land is generally too expensive for us as a dumping area for gypsum.
sentences.cn: 把地面用来作为石膏的倾倒场所一般说来是太浪费了.

sentences.en: The sample consisted of pebbles of gypsum and fragments of volcanic rock.
sentences.cn: 这个样本由石膏鹅卵石和火山岩碎块组成.

sentences.en: The yellow substance was gypsum, or calcium sulfate dehydrate, a common component of plaster.
sentences.cn: 这种黄色的物质叫做脱水硫化钙，通常是石膏的一种组成部分。

sentences.en: Their mouths were full of gypsum.
sentences.cn: 他们的嘴里叼满了石膏。

sentences.en: Thickeners were introduced for separating the acid and gypsum.
sentences.cn: 用稠厚器来分离酸和石膏.

sentences.en: This method of handling gypsum is satisfactory.
sentences.cn: 这种输送石膏的方法是令人满意的.

sentences.en: Township enterprises product, coal, iron ore, gypsum, coke, and ceramics.
sentences.cn: 乡镇企业产品有煤 、 铁矿石 、 石膏 、 焦炭和陶瓷制品.

sentences.en: Under the circumstances, gypsum or anhydrite Co. ld accumulate to form beds many meters thick, without any Co. precipitation of halite.
sentences.cn: 在这种环境下，石膏或硬石膏可以堆积成许多米厚的岩层，而没有任何石盐伴生沉淀。

phrases.tran_cn: 石膏块材，石膏砌块；石膏块
石膏灰泥，石膏抹面；石膏胶凝材料；粉饰用石膏粉

trans.tran_en: a soft white substance that is used to make  plaster of paris

trans.tran_cn: 用石膏处理；施石膏肥料于
